name: Banishment Tales of an Outkast DEMO
name_original: Banishment Tales of an Outkast DEMO
description:
Banishment Tales of an Outkast brings a NEW GENRE into the gaming world.

Banishment Tales of an Outkast is a text adventure inspired game. We here at Active Gaming feel the old style of text adventure games are not talked about to much and feel sometimes, you have to take a step back and appreciate how much games have come sense they were created. Banishment Tales of an Outkast brings a new genre or revamped an old one, we currently have no solid name so a placeholder name is being used, folder explorer, we have no idea what it should be called and would like you, the fans, the followers, the passer byres, to give a fitting name for this new/innovated genre of gaming
